User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

plan.description: The user's subscription plan (e.g., trial, builder, architect).

lemonSqueezyCustomerId.description: The user's customer ID from Lemon Squeezy.

subscriptionStatus.description: The status of the user's subscription from Lemon Squeezy (e.g., active, cancelled).

renewsAt.description: The date the user's subscription is set to renew.

maxBricks.description: The maximum number of bricks the user can lay per day, based on their energy audit.

Brick.title: Brick
Brick.description: Represents a single task or 'brick' for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this brick.

notes.description: Optional user-added notes for the brick.

isCompleted.description: Whether the brick is completed or not.

date.description: The date the brick was created (YYYY-MM-DD).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the brick was created.

/users/{userId}/bricks/{brickId}.description: Stores the bricks for each user.

/checkouts/{sessionId}.description: Temporary storage for user data during checkout.
